true text 862767af835d9610b8bec7c6feaad36d false true true false false false 2 {"firstLoadTimestamp":1733036651762,"isGenAiGenerated":false,"isGenAiMultiTaskCancelled":false,"taskList":[],"timeTakenToFirstSave":746675,"timeTakenToPublish":1273076} 1cfda8d983521210b8bec7c6feaad38e 49b02d0483169250b8bec7c6feaad3c6 How to Request a Loaner Vehicle for Work Our Loaner Vehicle program offers contractors convenient access KB0010001 2024-12-01 5 Loaner Vehicle Request Process kb_knowledge shari.lemonnier 2024-12-01 07:16:38 global / 494a028883d69250b8bec7c6feaad31d 7 shari.lemonnier 2024-12-04 21:34:01 58 How to Request a Loaner Vehicle for Work

Our Loaner Vehicle program offers contractors convenient access to vehicles for work purposes. This guide explains the available vehicles and the process for submitting a request through the Loaner Vehicle Online Portal.

 

Available Vehicles

We offer the following vehicles to meet your needs

  1. Transit 350 HD Cargo Van
    • Ideal for transporting equipment and supplies.
    • Features a spacious cargo area.

  2. Tacoma Access Cab
    • Perfect for smaller tasks requiring a compact but capable pickup.
    • Seats up to four passengers.

  3. F350 Super Duty Super Cab
    • Designed for heavy-duty tasks.
    • Provides robust towing capacity and spacious interior.

  4. CO Crew Cab
    • A versatile truck for larger crews and cargo.
    • Offers comfortable seating and ample bed space.

 

 

Requesting a Vehicle

 

Follow these steps to submit a loaner vehicle request:

  1. Access the Loaner Vehicle Online Portal
    • Log in to the portal using your contractor credentials.

  2. Navigate to the Loaner Vehicle Request Page
    • Select the “Request a Vehicle” option from the main menu.

  3. Fill Out the Request Form
    • Complete all required fields:
      • Preferred Vehicle: Choose from the list of available vehicles.
      • Pickup Date and Time: Specify when you need the vehicle.
      • Return Date and Time: Indicate the expected return timeframe.
      • Purpose: Briefly explain the work-related need.

  4. Submit Your Request
    • Review the information for accuracy.
    • Click “Submit” to send your request for approval.

  5. Await Confirmation
    • You will receive an email notification once your request is approved or if additional details are needed.

 

 

Important Information

  • Eligibility: Loaner vehicles are available to active contractors for work-related purposes only.

  • Availability: Vehicle availability is subject to demand. Requests are processed on a first-come, first-served basis.

  • Pickup/Return Location: Details about the pickup and return process will be provided in the confirmation email.

  • Contact Support: If you encounter issues with the portal or have questions, contact [Support Team Contact Information].
